commands.title: Generate Translation String from code file (angular component only)
Generate Translation String Without Replacement of selection

ngx-translate-quickcreate.autocapitalize.description: Automatically capitalize the translation string key - only applies in snake case mode.

ngx-translate-quickcreate.autoFileModify.description: Automatically modifies transilation files that are specified in the extension settings.

ngx-translate-quickcreate.languageFrom.description: The source language to be translated from.

ngx-translate-quickcreate.languageTo.description: The source language to be translated to.

ngx-translate-quickcreate.googleAPIKey.description: Specify a google API key in order to add google translations to the target language. Leave empty to paste the selected text to the target translated file key as it is.

ngx-translate-quickcreate.caseMode.description: Type of case to use for translation string - options are 'camel' and 'snake'.

ngx-translate-quickcreate.replaceOnTrans.description: Replace the selected text after generating a translation string.

ngx-translate-quickcreate.translatePipeN.description: The name of the pipe to handle the translation.

ngx-translate-quickcreate.quote.description: Which quote to use around the inserted translation key.

ngx-translate-quickcreate.padding.description: Add spaces inside the curly bracket pair.
